schools.name: Ozyegin University
schools.description: I have been studying Computer Science at Ozyegin University since 2015. I learned English in prep school called Scola at first year and then I started learning computer science basics and concepts. You can find taken courses related to computer science below.

schools.name: Beyoglu Anatolian High School
schools.description: I have studied Science & Math fields for 4 years and I took Mathematics, Geometry, Chemistry, Biology and Physics courses predominantly, besides I took Literature, Geography, History, and other mandatory courses as well. At the end, I won Ozyegin University Computer Science Department with scholarship.
